Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory233.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: 'Why are you all banged up?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The director wants to scold Changyu, but all he can muster up is a sigh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'I just had a run-in with some thugs... No big deal.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu replies and looks around the theater. Laoyu is sitting at a table off to the side with Yusheng, who he had not seen for some time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: '...Yusheng! Where have you been all this time?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu perks up with a smile, surprised at the sight of seeing a familiar face after so long.'}
{2: 'Yusheng', 3: 'I had some family matters to attend to, so...'}
{3: 'Yusheng rubs his fingers. His once immaculate white hands are now wrapped in bandages.'}
{2: 'Yusheng', 3: "You're back just in time. I wanted to bid you all farewell."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Farewell? Where are you going?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yusheng', 3: "Didn't you hear what Lady Qu said? The Corrupted are coming. I'm going to fight on the frontline."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Why? I saw some people walking towards the port. Shouldn't we pack up and board the ship together?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Hearing Changyu's response, Yusheng shakes his head."}
{2: 'Yusheng', 3: 'After listening to the whole speech in the plaza, I choose to believe in Lady Qu.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Huh? You buy into this whole "will of Kowloong" thing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yusheng', 3: "It's my own decision. Lady Qu left the choice to each of us."}
{2: 'Yusheng', 3: 'The ship is not suitable for my sick wife. Staying in the city to participate in the Tabula Akasha is more suitable for us.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Tabula Akasha? What's that? Forget it. It doesn't matter. So, why are you going to the frontline? What about your wife?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yusheng', 3: "She's waiting for the Tabula Akasha to begin, but that's going to take some time."}
{2: 'Yusheng', 3: 'Yes. Someone has to do it, just like Lady Qu and the others.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Director, try talking some sense into Yusheng.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'What are you doing, Director? Why are you just standing there...? Are you also planning...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: "...Yes. I made my own choice as well... I don't want to board the ship and run away. Nor do I want to join the Tabula Akasha. I'm staying here in the theater.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "I can't do something like abandoning my body and living in some machine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'All I can do is stay with the theater left to me by my ancestors.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "...In that case, I'll stay here too!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: 'Quit kidding around! Go upstairs and pack your things. Laoyu, go take Changyu to the port.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Laoyu', 3: 'O-of course.'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "You're still young. You shouldn't give up your life like the rest of us.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "I'm old enough to fight!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: "Now's not the time to act up!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "If you're staying to fight, then count me in! After the war is over, we can continue running the theater. I just finished repairing the props we'll need...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'Changyu, if you really have grown up, then quit being so naive!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "I didn't have the heart to say it, but I sold the theater a long time ago. That's why Yusheng was able to take his wife to see a doctor.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "But who could've imagined something like this would happen before she was cured.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "You are just a child. You can't possibly understand the cruelties of warâ€”we might not survive. This is the last time we'll ever see each other.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "As the director, I appreciate your dedication to the theater... But some things in this world can't be paid back.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'We are just a footnote in the history of Kowloong. We are constantly pushed forward by the flow of time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Enough!', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Changyu', 3: "I just don't want to lose everyone. I want things to go back to normal. You always treat me like a child and make decisions for me. But have you really asked what I think?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'This is for your own good.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Yes, I know. It's for my own good. I know I've only ever been a child in your eyes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "But I'm still a member of the Kowloong Theater!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Why didn't you tell me anything? I can help!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu begins to shake with anger, but his eyes remain firm with conviction.'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'Changyu...'}
{3: 'A sudden explosion outside the theater interrupts their conversation. Hearing this, Yusheng gets up from his seat.'}
{2: 'Yusheng', 3: "We're out of time... I need to get going. Care to see me off?"}
{3: 'The room falls silent. Yusheng smiles and walks toward the gate of the theater as Changyu and the others follow him out.'}
